title: Drawing, ca. 1848
medium: Rose, dark red, orange, and yellow tempera on paper (mounted on paper)
description: Vertical rectangle.  One repeat showing red and orange stylized foliage against a yellow ground.  Partially squared off (in pencil) for transfer.  Continuation of repeat on 1954-23-7.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ca. 1848.
ca. 1848. Rose, dark red, orange, and yellow tempera on paper (mounted on paper). Gift of John Judkyn. 1954-23-2.
